name: HDF5, Hierarchical Data Format, Version 5
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">h5</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: HDF5 is a general purpose software library (with APIs in several programming languages) and an associated file format for storing scientific data.  The data model includes two primary objects: a multidimensional array of records, called a dataset; and a structure for grouping objects.
